Nice idea; ive been wanting to get my hands on some of those retro blue and red glasses for things like this ln youtube!

P.s noticed my post number

Had to swap the eyes before it worked, but bits of it were quite good. An insane amount of interaxial though unless you're using a tiny screen. Also, if you can't control it during the capture, try to adjust the screen plane in post by sliding one eye relative to the other so that the object in focus sits on the screen plane instead of having everything way behind or in front. That would be less painful.
If only I had those old 3D glasses.
Hey you took streetlamp's video. Did you ask for permission?
I wathced this in my green/magenta glasses and i want some sort of mod. THIS IS AWESOME!

@nutt007

I'm alright with my video being used in this way. Permission wasn't asked, but if it was I would have responded with a "go ahead".

@Ayo99

I like what you did with the 3d. If only life were a little more 3d...

However I would kind-of like a mention in your post. On a similar note, I notice that ads play on your 3d version of my video. The music is from the KSP soundtrack and is royalty free to begin with so copyright issues wouldn't cause Youtube to automatically generate ads. You aren't monetizing my video, are you?

I only ask because making money off of someone else's work is a BIG no-no.
